item.title: [HTB] Machine: Monteverde
item.description: Monteverde Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.172 -T4 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-02 17:02 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.172 (10.10.10.172) Host is up (0.095s latency). item.title: [HTB] Machine: Legacy
